name: Flicker (Phur3ouZ_Games)
description:
This is a mobile game.

Are you sometimes bored and you just want a casual time-killer?

Flicker may be the game you're looking for then.

An extremely simple concept - swipe the screen to spawn balls, and get as many balls as you can before any 2 collide. The balls move in a straight line, dependent on your finger swipe direction. I feel it's quite intuitive once you get into it, but I'm probably wrong.

This is the first public release, and I don't feel there's much more to add.

Any comments, suggestions and feedback would be hugely appreciated!

Thanks for checking!
